title: MAP_VALUE_CONTAINS
description: Returns the corresponding return_value for the first compare_substring found within the provided string (case-sensitive). If no substrings match, returns default_return_value_optional. If default_return_value_optional is omitted and no matches occur, the function returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

parameters.name: … compare_substring
parameters.description: The substring to search for within the provided string.

parameters.name: … return_value
parameters.description: The value returned if the compare substring is found.

parameters.name: default_return_value_optional
parameters.description: The value returned if no substrings match. If omitted and no match occurs, returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

examples:
MAP_VALUE_CONTAINS(Description, "Platinum", "Partner", "Individual", "Person", "Business")
-- Returns "Partner" if 'Description' contains "Platinum" (stops evaluation even if "Individual" is found).

tips.text: Ensure that return_value and default_return_value_optional are of the same data type.
